name: Dice Template
description:
Roll the dice in this awesome template !!

3 options: 1 dice, 2 dice or 3 dice. Easy to add more if needed.

I have also made a tutorial on how to make this so if you want to save and learn then head over to my channel and watch & follow me create the mechanics for this template !!

Watch it here : Lets Make Dice in Buildbox Tutorial (Watch & Follow) - YouTube

Whats included?

1 x Bbdoc Template
